attributes.action: Change the way motor vehicle histories are kept.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I would like to see a national computerised register where any work carried out by any garage (Not just franchised dealerships) is recorded so that at any time (For a minimal fee)anyone can see the history of any vehicle and make an informed decision before a purchase. This register would be backed up by the garage's own individual invoice no. being the 'reference' No. for the job on the computer.
